comment._content: Commander-in-Chief of Spanish War Veterans (1912-1913), according to freepages.military.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~sunnyann/comman... and NYT of September 12, 1912 First president of the Pittsburgh Rotary Club, according to www.rotaryfirst100.org/districts/districts/7300.htm query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9405E1D8123CE633A...
